member.name: M:SynPSG.System.Convert.ToBase64String(System.@Byte[#],SynPSG.System.Base64FormattingOptions)
member.summary: Converts the value of an array of 8-bit unsigned integers to its equivalent String representation encoded with base 64 digits.
member.param: InsertLineBreaks to insert a line break every 76 characters, or None to not insert line breaks.

member.name: M:SynPSG.System.Convert.ToBase64String(Synergex.SynergyDE.a)
member.summary: Converts the value of an alpha variable to its equivalent String representation encoded with base 64 digits.

member.name: M:SynPSG.System.Convert.ToBase64String(System.@Byte[#])
member.summary: Converts the value of an array of 8-bit unsigned integers to its equivalent String representation encoded with base 64 digits.
